news.title: 英国夫妇在伊朗被判十年监禁
news.title0: Detained Briton describes life in Iran jail to BBC hours before sentencing
news.content: 一对英国夫妇在伊朗因间谍罪被判处十年监禁，其家人称判决“令人心碎”。
news.content0: A British woman who was detained by Iran has told the BBC it was hard to remain positive in prison, hours before she and her husband were sentenced to 10 years for espionage.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美主播母亲失踪案调查转向墨西哥
news.title0: Desperate hunt for breakthrough in Nancy Guthrie case turns to Mexico
news.content: 美国主播萨凡纳·格思里的母亲失踪案进入第三周，调查人员已联系墨西哥当局寻求协助。
news.content0: US investigators have reportedly been in touch with Mexican authorities about the disappearance of American news anchor Savannah Guthrie's mother, as the search stretches into a third week.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 澳奥运记者直播口齿不清后道歉
news.title0: Australian presenter apologises for drinking before slurred Olympics report
news.content: 澳大利亚体育记者在冬奥会直播中口齿不清，事后道歉称饮酒、高海拔和未吃晚餐是原因。
news.content0: An Australian sports presenter has apologised after a clip of her slurring her way through a live cross from the Winter Olympics in Italy went viral, with even Australia's prime minister weighing in.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 比尔·盖茨退出印度AI峰会
news.title0: Bill Gates pulls out of India's AI summit over Epstein files controversy
news.content: 比尔·盖茨在最后一刻决定不参加印度AI影响峰会并发表主旨演讲，其基金会称是为确保会议重点。
news.content0: Bill Gates will not deliver his keynote address at the India AI Impact Summit in Delhi, his philanthropic organisation said hours before the Microsoft co-founder was due to speak.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 韩国前总统因兵变未遂被判终身监禁
news.title0: South Korea's ex-president jailed for life over martial law attempt
news.content: 韩国前总统尹锡悦因试图实施戒严令颠覆宪法，被首尔法院判处终身监禁。
news.content0: South Korea's ex-president Yoon Suk Yeol has been jailed for life for masterminding an insurrection bytrying to impose military rule.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 卡塔尔打造空调“森林”应对酷暑
news.title0: The island with an air-conditioned ‘forest’ to cope with scorching summers
news.content: 卡塔尔在人工岛杰万岛上建造了一个空调“森林”，让游客能在夏日酷暑中舒适地在户外漫步。
news.content0: When summers hit Qatar, most people retreat indoors during the heat of the day, sheltering at home or work with the aircon cranked high or visiting super-cooled shopping malls — and driving between them in cars chilled to refrigerator temperatures.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 美加边境野火面积已达芝加哥两倍
news.title0: Plains megafire grows to nearly twice the size of Chicago with more dangerous weather to come
news.content: 美国平原地区“游侠路”特大野火已蔓延至28.3万英亩，面积接近芝加哥市的两倍，且危险天气仍在持续。
news.content0: Dangerous, critical fire weather conditions persist Thursday after more than a dozen new wildfires torched tens of thousands of acres andforced evacuations in the Plainsamid bone-dry conditions and powerful winds on Tuesday.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 欧洲担忧特朗普在科技领域再掀波澜
news.title0: Europe Worries About Another Trump Blowup, This One on Tech
news.content: 欧盟官员担忧美国可能因《数字服务法》对欧洲科技监管进行报复，引发新一轮跨大西洋贸易紧张。
news.content0: After a year filled with trade-related drama between the United States and the European Union, one outstanding gripe still has potential to fuel the fire: how the bloc regulates technology.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 美国南极科考因资金削减而“靠边站”
news.title0: On an Ambitious Antarctic Quest, One Nation Is on the Sidelines
news.content: 美国科学家参与南极科考主要依赖私人资助，因政府削减预算导致其唯一南极破冰船退役。
news.content0: Among the nearly 40 scientists who were at sea for eight weeks on a major expedition to Antarctica that ended on Thursday, roughly one in four was American.
news.author: NYTimes
